author: khrhms
text: Great AF outlet in the CBD area. Relatively spacious and not too busy after 6pm on a weekday. Showers available outside. Good range of machines and free weights available too. Awesome place for weekends workout because it‚Äôs relatively empty.

author: Arjun Kharidehal
text:
Many of the 5 star reviews seem to be of another branch as the photos are all inaccurate.

One star because the actual branch at 139 Cecil Street has one of the worst, horrible, smelly, non-ventilated toilets compared to any other gym across while of SG.

I've highlighted this many times to the AF team but they don't care it seems. If you are the kind who needs to shower after your workout, AVOID THIS GYM.

author: Daniel Ng
text:
Kind of a run of the mill AF. Nothing really unique about it but comes with the bare minimum of any AF. 2 squat racks, one deadlift platform, one smith machine and DBs only go up to 45kg. The gym is relatively spacious but the freeweight area is elevated so be careful not to trip.

Toilets are outside the gym and not the most convenient to shower in or put your stuff,  because there's only one small bench.

author: CZW
text: Convenient gym for folks in the CBD area. Not too crowded in the evenings. Nice to be able to gym with colleagues. Look for Zac to get more info if interested to know more.

author: Giselle Toh
text: I am thoroughly impressed with the exceptional experience I had at this Anytime Fitness outlet. The extensive range of high-quality equipment caters to all fitness needs, and the spacious layout enhances the workout environment. The staff members are not only friendly but also remarkably approachable, always ready to assist. The convenient accessibility of the location adds to the overall convenience, making it a top-notch choice for anyone seeking a stellar fitness facility.

author: Ben Evans
text:
Unfortunately this is a gym in major need of a revamp. The gym is echo-y and any drop of the weight will reverberate around the gym. The weight area is all supported by a incredibly worn out tarmac and every vibration can be felt.

However, that is not the worst part. The toilets of this gym may be the worst I have ever seen. No sense of cleanliness at all. Whether it is the morning, afternoon or evening, the toilet smells horrific and is incredibly dirty. The shower cubicles stink of something I do not want to think of and honestly it is just a horrible experience.

I would rather recommend Raffles Place down the road or Tanjong Pagar. This AF needs to be renovated as soon as possible.

author: Chun2
text:
It‚Äôs an okay gym, it‚Äôs a little hard to locate as there no signage or indication of where the outlet is exactly located(E.G which floor) Only managed to find thru google search,

It‚Äôs also listed as a gym with pool but there‚Äôs no directions on how to get there from the gym.

author: Edmund JP
text: I recently visited Anytime Fitness during a business trip to Singapore, and overall, it served its purpose for a quick workout. The gym offers plenty of benches and has a well-equipped setup. However, my experience was slightly marred by a broken vending machine that failed to dispatch my protein shake purchase. Despite this inconvenience, the gym deserves a solid 4/5 stars for its convenient location, well-maintained equipment, and overall functionality.

author: Ling Lan
text: spacious and clean environment. it is very quiet and very beginner-friendly as its my first time signing for gym, and equipments have instructions on teaching. it has spaces for classes like yoga etc but have yet to try.

author: Low Desiree
text:
AF Cecil has been my go-to gym because it‚Äôs the nearest to my office and most convenient for me. Gym is relatively big and has most of the equipment I need.

Zac from AF Cecil was also extremely proactive, answered all my questions and made the sign-up process extremely smooth.

He helped my friends sign up seamlessly. My friends were in the middle of a work event and he drove down to help them register at our lobby. Never seen this kind of service before üí™üèº thanks Zac!

author: Karin Ng
text: Location was a tad bit difficult to find. Went there a few times and didnt really feel comfortable in the gym. Equipments/Weights were all over for the times that I went, felt quite lupsup because it is not neat at all. Everything is mostly on the floor and I have to go around to find the weights that I want too. Saving grace is that the gym is quite spacious and the staff is friendly too. However, perfect if you work in the CBD area. Changing room is inside, toilet and shower have to go out of the gym and is slightly tight and squeezy.

author: rachel huang
text: Nice-smelling spacious gym with very cooling AC and many free weights available. Toilet is just right outside the gym, a little cramped but still very accessible.  Good CBD location too.

author: Hui Yun L
text: Nothing to complain about. The gym is clean, decent size and function. The toilets are clean.

author: Bum Hong
text: I've visited almost 10 Anytime Fitness branches in Singapore. This one is the largest, well spaced, great location, and has nearly branch new equipment.

author: Thineesh Selvaraju
text:
The air conditioning does not seem to be working, which makes the overall experience quite uncomfortable.

As for the equipment, the standard machines are available and in moderately okay condition, but nothing exceptional.

author: shan
text: always dropped by after work as its the closest to me, equipments ar sufficient but not updated. quite old, and also aircon is super weak. felt like only the fans are working?? plus the fans are super tiny kind rabak.

author: Darren Chong
text: Charging a $15 late payment fee just because payment fail to go through is absolutely atrocious. Disgusted with both anytime fitness and Ezypay. It's not like I do not want to pay, there was some error and payment didn't go through, and we have to pay the fee cuz of some system error? Also disappointed in Anytime fitness because for some reason they swapped my main/parent outlet to Cecil street and the charging of the monthly payment changed days, without any prior notice or warning, and because of this I was charged for the late fee. Extremely disappointed, I have been a member for 5 years and counting and nvr failed to pay, just for one time the company insists on the late payment. Will be cancelling my membership soon to seek services elsewhere, absolutely thrash customer and user experience.

author: Joping Chai
text: First time here, central location, clean and generally well equipped. If there was a functional deadlift platform it would be perfect!

author: Micky P
text: Probably the worst kept AF I‚Äôve been to. Very run down, small, bad layout and mouldy. Good location though ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è ‚Ä¶

author: Ronald Soh
text: Staff are fantastic, have not run into any issues with them so far. Equipment-wise, there are limitations due to the size of the place. Would have preferred for there to be more equipment and space at the free/heavy weights area since its usually the most popular.  Place gets quite crowded at the peak hours due to its location. Some of the members aren't very mindful but I'm not taking points away. Would be nice if there could be more lockers, too.

author: Nick Johnson
text:
It was a nice gym, a little hard to find at first. You need to take an elevator from an office type lobby to get to the gym and then you need a keycard from there.

A lot of nice equipment and the basics, also lockers and vending machines.

They have a nice pool on a higher floor that no one seemed to use at the time. I guess Singaporeans just don't swim much or something.

author: lowzm2
text: Zac very good service & quick to address concerns - thank you for your help!

author: Kelvin Ang
text: Well maintained and spacious at a prime location with a good view - minutes walk from train station. It was good while it lasts‚Ä¶. Gym is undergoing relocation and will reopen in Jul/Aug around the same area.

author: Ys Ng
text:
Had a terrible experience with Anytime Fitness at Cecil Street. I cancelled my membership back in April, informing them both via email and WhatsApp that I wouldn‚Äôt be renewing. Despite that, they continued to charge me in October! This is completely unacceptable.
It feels like they‚Äôre just trying to scam members by ignoring cancellation requests and continuing to charge fees. If you‚Äôre considering joining, be aware of how poorly they handle cancellations and communication. I‚Äôm now forced to demand a refund for the October fee and am considering legal action if this isn‚Äôt resolved. Absolutely disappointed with the way this was handled. Stay away from this gym if you value transparency and good customer service!

author: Tony Chen
text:
The location is good for people working nearby. It's spacious and clean environment. For beginners it is not bad.
However, the male toilet is a bit small (only 2 shower rooms)

author: Yit Ying Kuan
text:
It's my first gym membership and I'm loving it ‚ù§Ô∏è  No comment on their gym equipment cos' I'm only there for the swimming pool and the studio space. The pool is always clean and empty during lunch and you'll get all the sun you want! The studio space is also more than enough for me to practice my ballet, just that it's sometimes a little dusty. Teehee.

Yoga classes are included in the monthly membership fee. For the lesson quality, it's definitely more than its worth. OH, i like how they drop reminders before classes tooüòÄ

As for the ladies bathroom, it's 2 in 1 with the toilet. Not very comfy but still works. The hairdryer is better than the one i have at home, so I'm  more than happy to workout there before work or during lunch every day.

Staffs are friendly and helpful, and its always nice to talk to them. All in all, love it and it made me stick to my not-so-intense workout plans. Yay!

18 Apr 2024: Due to some personal reasons, I won't be able to go to gym for a long period of time, so I wanted to cancel my membership. The staff suggested to freeze my account instead of cancelling it, as my case is within the clause for freezing the account (I didn't know about this option.) I'm glad that the staff is well versed with the t&c and gave me the most suitable option. Cheers!

author: Shen Wei
text: Great location if you work in CBD and want to hit the gym during lunch. Facilities are clean, weights area isn‚Äôt too cluttered and ample space all around to do your exercise. Staff are friendly and helpful too!

author: Zihui Lim
text: Really love the convenience of the location! Equipments are new and clean. Spacious gym with really friendly staffs too. My PT - Marlon is very encouraging and does an amazing job in pushing me and helping me to achieve my fitness goals. Really appreciate every session with him! Even though I always joke that he is killing me slowly with all the exercises, but I feel so refreshed and energised after every session.

author: kai
text:
Honestly 4.5 rather than a 4.

Spacious and well-equipped gym located at the heart of CBD, staff have always been very nice and helpful.

Termination process was surprisingly very smooth (was expecting a nightmare given the negative experiences shared online about other AF)

Highly recommend, overall a positive experience apart from the occasional Wifi issues.

author: Aviral Bhargava
text:
Decent sized gym with decent equipment. Enough to get your basic workouts in. I also like that an iron and ironing board are available to get your clothes ironed before heading to work.

However, the shower cubicles can be improved. For the gents, this toilet is used in conjunction with the urinals and the shower cubicles are really small as well. Basic shower gel etc are not provided either. A shocker knowing that this gym is in the CBD area and such standards for the toilets are followed.

Have messaged the staff a month ago about improvements etc but no response from them since. Hopefully something is done to improve in this issue.

author: milkhoneywine x
text:
I love this AF branch. It‚Äôs always clean, the air conditioning is powerful, and the staff are nice. I enjoyed working out a great deal here. It‚Äôs also a fairly accessible spot, and has pool access on the rooftop! Can‚Äôt wait to come back and train here.

Karan has been an amazing trainer. I‚Äôve been working with him for the past couple of months, and he‚Äôs been kind, understanding, and accommodating. I‚Äôm brand-new to fitness, and that should be a real challenge, but Karan has made our gym sessions incredibly fun and inspiring. He‚Äôs patient and meets me where I am, while also encouraging me to gently push through and achieve my fitness goals. I went from doing 50KG linear leg presses to doing 100KG linear leg presses! I‚Äôm very thankful to have had him as my trainer and can‚Äôt wait to continue these sessions when I‚Äôm back in Singapore in December!

author: Spencer Paw
text: I went at midnight, so there wasn't a single soul in sight, which was amazing! The washrooms need to be kept clean better though, there were used paper towels thrown on the counter and sinks, and even an empty cigarette box on the floor. The equipment is on the better-kept side, by Anytime Fitness standards.

author: Timothy Hoon
text:
Equipment are rather new and clean( 2 racks 1 deadlift platform 1 smith machine etc.). Tons of treadmill, have about one of each machines and similar amount of free weights as a standard AF branch.

Convenient location along cecil street, somewhat near Raffles, Tanjong and Telok Ayer MRT.

üëçüèª

author: Koume Okamoto
text:
Great location,the gym staff are all very friendly and attentive especially the manager Kai!
Forgot my watch and my ring in the locker overnight but when I called the next day it was still there untouched!
Thankyou Kai for the help!Will definitely recommend this outlet

author: Patrick Heng
text: Good exercise enviroment, every equipment is well organised. Aircon is cool, sufficient equipment for all body parts training and also there a lot of treadmills. Most importanty, most people there are friendly and welcoming, no one will judge you. Will be a great place to work out after a tough day at work.

author: Marcus S
text: excellent gym and one of the few AFs within the CBD. spacious and clean and a good variety of equipment. also staff Kai was super helpful and attentive - helped me to recover and safekeep some lost personal belongings! üëçüèº ‚Ä¶

author: jerome sim
text: The gym itself is great but why I'm writing this review is because of my experience and shocking physical progress having trained with Marlon. He's a dedicated subject matter expert who always goes the extra mile to meet my needs while pushing me to the limit. I had gained a full kilogram of muscle while losing 2% body weight in 6 weeks. The progress is crazy and I'm truly thankful to have met the fella.

author: A.
text: Due to the building layout the relocated gym feels too compact and it is the worst place to be doing squats due to the uneven flooring.. The plates kept sliding off even with clips on.. that's how bad it is . You will have no center of gravity at the power racks which is dangerous.. I'm just lucky I was lifting light for that day if not I'd be severely injured

author: C Goh
text: Quite disappointed, was a old member from plus+ times, when i rejoin, staff was very eager to e-sign me up. Kept messaging me even over the weekends. But never once told me the gym relocated and never stated the new address in the agreement. Refused to allow me to withdraw when i visited the old branch n found out it moved. Poor service.

author: Jeremy Chan
text: Went there for the 1st time today. Smaller than I originally thought it would be. Can‚Äôt really fault them or anything though. Equipment looks pretty old. Gym has alright equipment though. Can‚Äôt complain about what they have.

author: ah yang
text:
Would like to give a heartfelt thanks for Team Cecil the 2 awesome ladies which i didn‚Äôt manage to get their names for solving my keyfob issue.

Super outgoing and friendly peeps without hesitation to let me use the gym.

author: Vanessa Tay
text:
The team at AF Cecil street are not helpful and are not there to help customers. As I consented to having my monthly payments be paid by Grab and due to technical issues by Grab that was of no fault of mine i.e. i fulfilled all the terms and conditions per the acknowledgement in the agreement, i wrote into AF Cecil street if they would consider waiving the late fee for this one time because it really was not anything on my part.

Without hesitation they redirect me to their payment platform EzPay to "help with my issue". I was to be redirected back to AF Cecil street as EzPay had mentioned that they were just "working on behalf of the merchant and any of the changes above should be conveyed to us by the merchant and would ultimately have an effect on how your direct debits are processed." which meant that AF Cecil street had every position and right to show good customer service to provide a one-time waiver.

However, they were so eager to earn from my late fee that they just responded with "Hi Vanessa, we understand your frustration. As much as we want to assist you on this matter. We are unable to do it." What kind of service is this? A gym that does not care for its patrons one bit, all it wishes to do is earn money. Not even bothering to consider the circumstances and provide some concession.

author: Weiyang W
text: An amazing experience since moving to Cecil street ATF a month ago. The gym's layout is oganised and practically spaced. Relevant equipments to suit diverse fitness goals. Friendly staff, not the usual standoffish gym. Highly recommended.

author: Chino Lagdameo
text: Cheers to Bernie and Rick great blokes! I was in Singapore for a couple of days and I am a Anytime Fitness member in Australia. They were super understanding and allowed me to gym without my key fob. Central location, good amount of machines and great ambience.

author: Hans Chan
text:
Perfect location convenient walk from Telok Ayer or Raffles Place MRT. I like the fact that it is within an office building so it feels more exclusive/out of sight from public.

Amenities are well equipped and I would say this is one of the top 5 in Singapore. I like that the level of crowd is quieter than the neighborhood located ones during 8-10pm timings and I hope it would stay that way.

Honestly, don't have anything to critique aside from the fact that because I'm not a home gym member here, the staff could not help me with my membership issues. But overall fantastic place to workout

author: Tabasco Guzzler
text: The girl on duty whom I just spoke to today (7/6/24) around 4:45 pm had the worst phone etiquette ever - obnoxious, loud and gangsterish. I was thinking of signing up and had some questions for her - but she was obviously in a foul mood & decided to be aggressive and unpleasant. Thanks to her - I‚Äôm taking my business elsewhere!

author: Hidayah J
text: Helpful and friendly lady staff, good environment to workout after work! If u go on wee hours..the gym is all to urself. :)

author: Jia Ho Soh
text:
Unprofessional & selfish branch operator who doesn't care about their client, the only thing she do is hard sell to force you transfer your monthly subscription to their outlet if you have previously signed with other outlet and steal commission from other outlet.
If you refuse to transfer, she will ban you from entering.
Shameful & unethical tactic!  Beware!

author: Peter Sasi
text: Good location, modern equipment. Not the largest but okay. However several times had no soap in the dispenser in the restroom and also in the shower. On one occasion had no warm water. Often the have to hunt for hangers as the are not collected back to the clothes ganger rack.

author: Karen Cheng
text:
Tried to use the gym. After about 2 months of my last visit. Found that it is closed and in the process of moving to another location.

Called the management to check the whereabout of my stuffs - a nice pair of Nike shoes cosing more than $200, towels and small exercise accessories - in the locker. The staff was fully aware that I was storing my stuffs overnight in the locker and had even assigned the locker - one that is not a convenient location - to me. Initially Rick said that if Bernnie is aware I was using the locker to storey stuff overnight, he would have kept the stuff for me. 15 min later, he called me back and informed me they did not keep anything from the lockers and they were most probably taken by the contractors and denied defensively and rudely that it was not their fault as I should have read the notice put up on the move. I reasoned that I was not aware and could not have read the notice since I had not Bern back to the gym for weeks.

Loss of my things aside and is small matter. What annoyed me was his too-fast to deny any responsibility attitude with no apology.  As he said , if Bernnie was aware I was keeping my stuff overnight in the locker. He would have kept for me. The fact was he was aware.

I feel they had not managed the move well. Is it so difficult to keep the remaining stuffs from the lockers of their members for a few months? Upon aware of the outcome despite his earlier statement that they should be kept, he changed his stand 180 degree and pointed all his 5 fingers at me.

I think I will not be patronizing the gym anymore despite its closeness to my office.

Totally disappointed with their attitude and management.

author: sotong cha
text: Great service and care from the gym staffs, left my item behind and they helped took care of it till i got it back. Well equipped gym with multiple machines and benches to go around.

author: Ron Ng Kok Keong
text: One of the rare AFs with access to pool facilities. Staff is also efficient with my queries as I had requested for invoice and statements for company claims previously. Response time to queries via email and WhatsApp were also fast!

author: nusha dakshyni
text: one of the best AFs ive been to. sufficient equipment & great space. toilets and showers super clean. cute crocs provided for each cubicle. even had shower gel& face wash!

author: Raden NINNIN
text: The gym is good & very clean due to the uncle cleaning very morning, thank you uncle. Salute. Uncle 5 star for u, but now when u come in the early morning the gym is a mess, the weights didn't keep well is all over the place. Is like a kindergarten school all toys all over the places. Without someone to clear it. Gonna miss the old Cecil AF.. sigh.. come before work is all clean & feel likes always gym. Like home. Sorry I have to put 0.5stars. plus don't bully the uncle. -_-

author: Jolynn Tan
text: AMAZING STAFF, SUPER METICULOUS! Marlon went the extra mile to find my WHOOP watch charger! He is amazing!!! Please look for him if you need help with your fitness journey, I am sure he will look out for you :-) Cheers!

author: suyog patil
text:
Beware of forceful selling at this gym!!!
Staff will forcefully enroll in training and will not even complete all classes.They are just there to get your money. Try negotiating or say No to their face..Gym is ok, bathrooms are average with minimal stuff

author: Josh Loke
text: The gym is nicely furnished, very value for money as you can use all the AF outlets islandwide. The gym manager (Burney) was very understanding when I injured my back- he packed for me the weights I used.

author: Audrey
text: Machine was spoilt, aircon v weak

author: Darragh Lenihan
text:
Whilst this gym is very busy at lunch times, if you manage to attend off peak you have the gym to yourself. great facilities and very clean.

I would move the boxing bag. it is in a clumsy place as it doesn't swing freely

and  i would move the lifting platform away from the wall

author: Aaron Jones
text: Very clean and quiet gym. Well maintained equipment and friendly staff. Great for a solid workout.

author: Low Yuxing
text: The gym is clean, facility is relatively new and well maintained and has around 12 changing/shower room including toilets. The location is not too far from raffles place mrt.

author: Jessica Laszlo
text:
We arrive on Jan 1st to a locked door and no staff. The hours posted on the door say that the gym is staffed, with limited hours, during Sundays and Public Holidays. We were there during the aforementioned time frame, but still no staff.

I called the number on the door and the responder said that as of 2020, there will be no staff on Public Holidays. There is no information about this at the gym; no paper posted on the door, no change to the current posted hours, nothing.

New Years resolution is off to a bad start.

author: Nomadanny Poh
text: Gym is decent, but management in serious need for sales and customer service training Urgently.

author: Shaun Q
text: Scam. Was looking for a gym to be a member of, and Glenn, the sales person who was doing his sales pitch for me promised me that he would waive off the future termination fee if I do decide to join and sign the papers. And now when I want to cancel, I am not allowed to. Big scam.

author: Georgia L
text: very friendly, responsive and helpful staff, clean space. relatively spacious and less crowded than the international plaza outlet.

author: Kent Lee
text: Excellent level 2 with huge punching bag and functional training and level 1 the regular stuff. Has shower and changing room as well üí™üí™üí™ but no toilet ‚Ä¶

author: Shawn Adrian Tan Yan Tong tan
text: It's like any anytime fitness. It's on the 4th floor. But there are no signs. So it's confusing to get to. Staff operating hours are from 10am - 4/5pm?? So it's tough to catch a staff member to ask about the prices.

author: Tan Bing Rui
text:
great environment to enjoy your workouts
friendly and outgoing staff!
love the club-customer interaction!

author: F T
text: Instructors/ trainers there need to stop staring at the members in a very judging way then talk amongst themselves and laugh at other ppl working out. Truly that is not how u run a business or retain customers.

author: Kelly Koh
text: Kai was very prompt in her replies and super super helpful and friendly! She wasn‚Äôt pushy with the different membership types and was just very nice!

author: no-reply
text: Old material. And quite a mess. Would be good if staff correct people that dont put their material back after using. Otherwise it will turn into a complete chaos

author: Robin Lee
text: Friendly staff in a very conveniently located gym. Thanks Kai for responding to my request quickly!

author: W
text: Place is decent but one of the two changing room's mirror dropped down long ago. Staff didn't bother replacing it ever since.

author: Z
text: Pretty small gym with limited machines. Location is convenient for cbd workers.

author: xavier phua
text: Despite having a decent sized gym and equipment, the toilet is terrible. Too crammed and small.

author: Su Lee
text: Great!! It's just that the building entrance could be easily missed. It is sandwiched between buildings oh other address. Must remember the address is 139

author: mei yee
text: A rude Indian security girl downstairs, I brought my fren to ask membership and she not allow to access

author: Faizal Lee
text: Great Gym in CBD. Affordable and convenient place to workout. Friendly staffs too.

author: J Tan
text: Convenient location, well maintained equipment and kind receptionist.  Highly recommended!

author: Phoebe Neo
text: I have been there for few months. Good gym experience and friendly environment. üëçüèªüëçüèª

author: Edwin Kiew
text: Decently priced gym with easy access to branches at convenient locations. Basic but has got everything I need.

author: Herddie Norman
text: It was office hours and it‚Äôs still not pack with CBD Office crowds impressively clean nice place to work out Kovan and Cecil Street the best üëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è ‚Ä¶

author: M Ng
text: Compared to Nex and Kovan, the management here is much better with their communication skills and also more sensible and rationale with their rules

author: jerome tan
text:
Nice place with good equipment and staff.

Thanks May for showing me around and being super friendly and welcoming.

author: Mikey :
text: The physical facilities are in disrepair. Wonder if they are moving out soon?!!

author: Dinh Xuan Nhat
text: Asked the manager to cancel my membership from Aug but he didn't do that, disaster

author: Na'im Rashid
text: Awesome staff, nice place. A shoutout to May for being awesome and signing me up in a breeze. :))

author: ÍπÄÍ≤ΩÌÉú
text: I am so satisfied with my gym ppl are nice with good equipment

author: Ajmal Hussain
text: Nice big gym, but it is missing something, I'm not sure what. And no equipment for calf workouts.

author: Melvin Kek
text: Great place to work out at. Service is good as well

author: lee le bin
text: Terrible customer service, staff are unreasonable and doesnt keep members well being to heart

author: anders ong
text: Clean gym and friendly staff. Highly recommended.

author: Freddy
text: Friendly staff and excellent facilities in a convenient location

author: Myo Khant
text: One of thr best customer service Anytime Fitnesses so far.

author: L Lo
text: Great place to exercise. Trainers there can help if you have problems with the equipments.

author: Jason L.
text: Renovation smell at the entrance, decent gym for the price

author: Dane Fernandez
text: Good equipment and facilities although slightly cramped layout, not a large open space.

author: Jerome Tong
text: Sadly, this gym calls itself ‚ÄúAnytime‚Äù fitness but doesn‚Äôt open 24/7

author: A
text: well mannered staffs and friendly environmen. thoroughly acquired knowledge about what's right for me

author: bob cat
text: Convenient location and awesome tour around the gym by Syamirul

author: Case Woo
text: So peaceful on a Sunday evening. Shiok.

author: Thomas Nation
text: Ok good respect love the way the guy who Jen bible say

author: Steven Tan
text: Money minded staff..Better to avoid. Force people to sign up PT.

author: Huzie Jasni
text: Easy access from Telok Ayer or Raffles Place

author: tan jason
text: They've already close down and it wasn't stated Google

author: Harvey Chuang
text: Good environment and friendly employee

author: Sisley Jorinz
text: Awesome gym with friendly staffs

author: M U
text: Very quiet during weekend.

author: Rosenthal Gabriel
text: Good service and excellent staff

author: venkatachalam Ramasamy
text: Good place to do workouts..

author: Keith Chan
text: Awesome gym!

author: Arvin Cruz
text: Very accomodating staffs üí™ ‚Ä¶

author: Jonathan Chia
text: Decent gym facilities

author: Kevin Loh
text: Lots of PTs standing around looking to hardsell

author: Jovin Tong
text: Cool gym!

author: Shmi J
text: Female staff was quite condescending

author: Clarence Benjamin Lim
text: No frills gym.

author: Jingxi Lim
text: Well maintained

author: Kit Weng
text: Unfriendly staff, discriminatory treatment.

author: E
text: Most of the music choice is üíØ ‚Ä¶

author: gunjan basu
text: Gr8 gym, lot of equipments

author: Esther Moo
text: Affordable gym in the downtown

author: Pineapple Ananas
text: Clean environment and equipment

author: A. Lim
text: Great for training legs!

author: Lit Yan Tham
text: A strategic location

author: Eunice K
text: Clean & spacious

author: Tan Gui Hong
text: Awesome and nice vibe

author: Weets Goh

author: Bear Melon
text:
Location 4 (Raffles Place MRT)
Space 4
Cleanses 5
Machine 3 (Life fitness)
Free weight 3 racks
Staff 4
Recommended: legs

It's unusual to find it in an office building (building name PLUS)
You need a key to enter the building
There are few types of machines, but it's clean and spacious
The machines are LIFE fitness
There is a body composition analyzer
Very quiet on weekends, but quite crowded on weekday nights

author: Sonata Hasibuan
text:
The strategic location is comfortable, I love the gym here.
Want a diet that's not torturous? Just go to the gym without having to control your diet..?
